prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets and provide your predictions.
You have been given RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT from web search for each market.
Use this information to make more informed predictions.


Market 1:
Title: Will Aztec launch a token by December 31, 2026?
Recent trade: $1,000.00 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/will-aztec-launch-a-token-in-2025

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
Aztec Network, a privacy-focused Ethereum Layer 2 solution, has recently launched its native token, AZTEC, marking a significant milestone in its development. The public sale of AZTEC tokens concluded on December 6, 2025, raising approximately 19,476 ETH (around $61 million) from over 16,700 participants. ([theblock.co](https://www.theblock.co/post/381618/aztec-network-raises-over-60-million-in-eth-with-community-first-token-sale-testing-new-auction-model/?utm_source=openai))

The token sale utilized a novel Continuous Clearing Auction (CCA) mechanism, developed in collaboration with Uniswap Labs, aiming to provide transparent price discovery and fair access for all participants. ([cointelegraph.com](https://cointelegraph.com/news/uniswap-launches-continuous-clearing-auctions-token-sales?utm_source=openai)) Notably, half of the committed capital came from community members, including testnet operators and early users, rather than large institutional investors. ([theblock.co](https://ww...

---

Market 2:
Title: Will Lionel Messi play in the 2026 FIFA World Cup?
Recent trade: $607.77 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/will-lionel-messi-play-in-the-2026-fifa-world-cup

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, Lionel Messi has not definitively confirmed his participation in the 2026 FIFA World Cup. In a recent interview, Messi stated, "I haven't made a decision yet about the World Cup. Match by match, I'll finish the season, then have preseason, and in six months, I'll see how I feel." ([goal.com](https://www.goal.com/en-us/lists/lionel-messi-argentina-future-open-for-2026-world-cup/blt40e8991c1eb8d290?utm_source=openai))

Messi's Argentina teammate, Nicolás Otamendi, expressed confidence in Messi's potential participation, saying, "I don't see Leo missing out on the World Cup." ([espn.com](https://www.espn.com/soccer/story/_/id/45587896/lionel-messi-unlikely-miss-2026-world-cup-nicolas-otamendi?utm_source=openai))

Additionally, Messi's former teammate Ariel Ortega believes Messi will be present at the 2026 World Cup, noting, "He's going to be at the World Cup." ([amp.marca.com](https://amp.marca.com/en/world-cup/2025/12/09/693864eaca4741cc6b8b45c8.html?utm_source=o...

---

Market 3:
Title: Will FC Nantes win on 2025-12-12?
Recent trade: $647.57 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/fl1-ang-nan-2025-12-12

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
FC Nantes is set to face Angers Sporting Club de l'Ouest on December 12, 2025, at Stade Raymond Kopa in Angers. ([thescore.com](https://www.thescore.com/fran/events/89963?utm_source=openai))

**Recent Performance:**

- **FC Nantes:** The team has been struggling, with only 2 wins, 5 draws, and 8 losses in their last 15 league matches, placing them 17th in Ligue 1. ([betting-sites.ng](https://www.betting-sites.ng/bettingtip/bettingtip-angerssco-fcnantes-2025-12-12/?utm_source=openai))

- **Angers SCO:** Angers has shown better form, with 5 wins, 4 draws, and 6 losses in their last 15 league matches, positioning them 11th in the league. ([betting-sites.ng](https://www.betting-sites.ng/bettingtip/bettingtip-angerssco-fcnantes-2025-12-12/?utm_source=openai))

**Head-to-Head Record:**

In their last five encounters, both teams have secured two wins each, with one match ending in a draw. ([dailysports.net](https://dailysports.net/predictions/angers-vs-nantes-prediction-h2h-and-probable-lineu...

---


Provide predictions for each market in the specified format.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.
Use this context to make more informed predictions.

For each market, provide your prediction in this exact format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Reasoning: [brief 1-2 sentence explanation that references the news context if relevant]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES means you would bet on the "Yes" outcome
- NO means you would bet on the "No" outcome
- NO_TRADE means you would not take a position

Be concise and focused on the most promising opportunities.
consensus_summary: The consensus strongly predicts "YES" for Market 1, as all AIs agree the token launch has already occurred. For Market 3, there is unanimous agreement on "NO," citing Nantes's poor form versus Angers. However, Market 2 shows a split between "YES" and "NO_TRADE," reflecting the uncertainty from Messi's non-committal statements versus optimistic external signals.

openai.response:
MARKET 1: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: Aztec Network has already launched its native token, AZTEC, and completed its public sale on December 6, 2025. There is no need to take a position as the event has already occurred, and the market seems resolved.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: Lionel Messi has not yet confirmed his participation in the 2026 FIFA World Cup and has indicated that he will decide based on his condition in six months. While there is optimism from teammates, the uncertainty surrounding his decision makes this a risky bet at the moment.

MARKET 3: NO  
Reasoning: FC Nantes is struggling with poor recent performance, having only 2 wins in their last 15 matches and currently ranking 17th in Ligue 1. In contrast, Angers SCO has shown better form and is positioned higher in the league, suggesting a higher likelihood of them winning the match.

gemini.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: The news explicitly states that Aztec Network launched its native token, AZTEC, and concluded its public sale on December 6, 2025, which is well before the market's December 31, 2026 deadline.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: While Lionel Messi has not definitively confirmed his participation, he has not ruled it out and plans to assess his physical condition, with teammates expressing confidence he will play.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: FC Nantes is currently struggling, placed 17th in Ligue 1 with only 2 wins in their last 15 matches, and will be playing away against Angers SCO, who are in better form (11th in the league).

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: The news context explicitly states that Aztec Network launched its AZTEC token with a public sale concluding on December 6, 2025, which definitively resolves the market question of a launch by December 31, 2026.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: While teammates are optimistic, Messi himself has stated he has not made a decision and will assess his condition in six months, creating significant uncertainty that makes a confident bet unwarranted at this time.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: The context shows FC Nantes is in poor form (17th in Ligue 1) and struggling with only 2 wins in 15 matches, while their opponent Angers is in better form and league position, making a Nantes win the less likely outcome.

claude.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: Aztec has already launched their token in December 2025, with the public sale concluding on December 6, 2025 and raising over $60 million. The token exists and was launched well before the December 31, 2026 deadline.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: Messi has not made a definitive decision yet, stating he'll evaluate "match by match" and assess how he feels after the season. While teammates express optimism, there's genuine uncertainty given his age (will be 39) and his own non-committal statements.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: FC Nantes is in poor form (17th place, only 2 wins in last 15 matches) while Angers is performing better (11th place, 5 wins in last 15). Playing away at Stade Raymond Kopa further disadvantages Nantes, making an Angers win or draw more likely.

opus.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Reasoning: The news clearly confirms that Aztec Network has already launched its native token AZTEC, with a public sale that concluded on December 6, 2025, raising approximately $61 million. This market should resolve to Yes as the token has already launched well before the December 31, 2026 deadline.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: While Messi hasn't definitively confirmed participation, he's left the door open saying he'll "see how I feel" in six months. His teammates express confidence he'll play, and as the reigning World Cup champion at 38, the motivation to defend the title in a tournament partly hosted in the Americas makes participation likely.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: FC Nantes is in poor form (2 wins in 15 matches, 17th place) while playing away against Angers who has better recent form (5 wins in 15 matches, 11th place). The head-to-head record is even, but current form and home advantage favor Angers, making a Nantes win unlikely.
